main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in the sky over Indianapolis, Indiana on June 20, 1965, moving from East to West and stopping before disappearing.
interesting points: The object had concentrated and rotating lights, estimated to be larger than a full moon, moving at approximately 125-150 mph., The object was observed for about 25 seconds., Witness described the object as very silent with a white glowing light., The object covered about 1/4 of the sky when first observed and about 1/8 when last seen., The witness reported the object as moving in a westward direction and disappearing into the southwest.
sighted object: a circular or disk-shaped object with rotating lights
witness description: a 61-year-old male, retired public accountant with a keen interest in UFOs
